html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2012-02792012-03-08,  FIN,  ,  ,  , 
ActNorthwest Territories Act
SubjectBorrowing Limit - Northwest Territories
PrecisOrder (a) repealing Order in Council P.C. 2010-555 of April 29, 2010; (b) approving the borrowing of money from time to time, by the Commissioner of the NORTHWEST TERRITORIES, on behalf of the Government of the NORTHWEST TERRITORIES, for territorial, municipal or local purposes, provided that the aggregate, from all sources, of all borrowed principal amounts outstanding and accrued interest, does not exceed the sum of $800 million.
RegistrationRegistration: UNR/
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Borrowing Limit - Northwest Territories
precis: Order (a) repealing Order in Council P.C. 2010-555 of April 29, 2010; (b) approving the borrowing of money from time to time, by the Commissioner of the NORTHWEST TERRITORIES, on behalf of the Government of the NORTHWEST TERRITORIES, for territorial, municipal or local purposes, provided that the aggregate, from all sources, of all borrowed principal amounts outstanding and accrued interest, does not exceed the sum of $800 million.
